commands.description: Search for file catalogs. See more: https://developer.carbonblack.com/reference/enterprise-protection/8.0/rest-api/#filecatalog
commands.name: cbp-fileCatalog-search

commands.description: Search for computers. For more information, see the Carbon Black documentation: https://developer.carbonblack.com/reference/enterprise-protection/8.0/rest-api/#computer
commands.name: cbp-computer-search

commands.description: Updates computer objects. Note that some computer properties can be changed only if specific boolean parameters are set. For more information, see the Carbon Black documentation: https://developer.carbonblack.com/reference/enterprise-protection/8.0/rest-api/#computer
commands.name: cbp-computer-update

commands.description: Returns information for a computer. For more information, see the Carbon Black documentation: https://developer.carbonblack.com/reference/enterprise-protection/8.0/rest-api/#computer
commands.name: cbp-computer-get

commands.description: Search for file instances. For more information, see the Carbon Black documentation: https://developer.carbonblack.com/reference/enterprise-protection/8.0/rest-api/#fileinstance
commands.name: cbp-fileInstance-search

commands.description: Search for events. For more information, see the Carbon Black documentation: https://developer.carbonblack.com/reference/enterprise-protection/8.0/rest-api/#event
commands.name: cbp-event-search

commands.description: Search for approval requests. For more information, see the Carbon Black documentation: https://developer.carbonblack.com/reference/enterprise-protection/8.0/rest-api/#approvalrequest

commands.description: Search for file rules. For more information, see the Carbon Black documentation: https://developer.carbonblack.com/reference/enterprise-protection/8.0/rest-api/#filerule

commands.description: Gets the file rule. For more information, see the Carbon Black documentation: https://developer.carbonblack.com/reference/enterprise-protection/8.0/rest-api/#filerule

commands.description: Deletes the file rule. For more information, see the Carbon Black documentation: https://developer.carbonblack.com/reference/enterprise-protection/8.0/rest-api/#filerule
commands.name: cbp-fileRule-delete

commands.description: Search for policies. For more information, see the Carbon Black documentation: https://developer.carbonblack.com/reference/enterprise-protection/8.0/rest-api/#policy
commands.name: cbp-policy-search

commands.description: Search in server configurations. For more information, see the Carbon Black documentation: https://developer.carbonblack.com/reference/enterprise-protection/8.0/rest-api/#serverconfig.
commands.name: cbp-serverConfig-search

commands.description: Search for publishers. For more information, see the Carbon Black documentation: https://developer.carbonblack.com/reference/enterprise-protection/8.0/rest-api/#publisher.

integration.description: VMware Carbon Black App Control (formerly known as Carbon Black Enterprise Protection) is a next-generation endpoint threat prevention solution to deliver a portfolio of protection policies, real-time visibility across environments, and comprehensive compliance rule sets in a single platform. This integration only supports Carbon Black on-premise APIs.
integration.name: VMware Carbon Black App Control v2

playbook.description: Hunt for endpoint activity involving hash and domain IOCs, using Carbon black Protection (Bit9).
playbook.name: Carbon black Protection Rapid IOC Hunting

playbook.description: Hunt for endpoint activity involving hash IOCs, using Carbon Black Protection.
playbook.name: Search Endpoints By Hash - Carbon Black Protection

description: Carbon Black Enterprise Protection is a next-generation endpoint threat prevention solution to deliver a portfolio of protection policies, real-time visibility across environments, and comprehensive compliance rule sets in a single platform.
